medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe lower abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting after dinner.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Sudden onset after dinner (meatloaf + sweet potatoes). Symptoms are the same as those initially presented with choledocholithiasis. The patient reports these symptoms with intensity similar to previous episodes. Denies fevers/chills, dyspnea, chest pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history:
- Paroxysmal atrial fibrillation on rivaroxaban
- Chronic diastolic heart failure
- Diabetes type II
- Asbestosis
- Essential tremor
- Knee osteoarthrosis s/p R knee replacement
- ___ esophagus
- Colonic adenoma
- Obesity
- Vit B12 deficiency
- BPH with nocturia
